name: Sports Flying car Flight-Aeroplane Simulator 2017
description:
You may have the experience of driving simple cars, buses, bikes, trucks etc. BUT in this simulation game we are giving you a golden chance to fly the latest futuristic sports cars as an expert and extreme stunt pilot.

SO Get ready for a breath taking 3D Turbo Sports car flying flight.

We offer you very latest and free to play very addictive Flying Sports Car game. Fly your best Sports car up on the extreme big city. Explore the modern Mega city by flying the stunning and beautiful airplane sports cars. You have to collect the stars scattered on the Mega city in very short span of time to check flying skills. Avoid collisions and accidents it may reduce your sports car power.
Fly your futuristic sports car and discover new landscapes. In this Flying sports car you can enjoy the drifts and stunts! Enjoy the best Futuristic Muscle Flying car ride and fly! Fly the fastest turbo sports cars with ultimate missions
Your Mission is to collect all stars in given time.
Extreme Sports car flying Simulator is made for all free futuristic flight games lover, helicopter flying, free quad copter flying, airplane flying and all flying simulator games but the Flying furious Sports Car is one of the best flying simulator game on iOS Store.

This game is perfect for you!

Extreme Sports car flying Simulator - GAME FEATURES:

• Adventurous & exciting multiple challenging levels.
• Realistic airplane and dynamic vehicle physics
• Extreme Flight Pilot experience
• Stunning 3D city Environment to Explore
• Collect the stars
• Smooth controls and fun gameplay
• Free to use
• Amazing flying sports car model with nitro
• Offline play
• Totally different from other parking games
• Explore the beautiful open world
• iOS Optimization: runs perfectly on anything from the original iPad 1 to the latest 5th Generation widescreen devices\

Just download it now and enjoy the flying thrill of luxurious and furious sports cars....
